Hey I found different opinions regarding the Mana restore effect of Judgement of the Wise.

Basically all I want to know is wether it has a 100% proc chance on hit and if it has an internal cooldown or is limited in any other way.

Currently I am simply restoring mana on each hit, but I read, that it might be limited to 15 procs per minute per damage class (melee, spell).

hmm... I model it as...

 

25% proc chance, no cooldown.
Do you have a source or confirmation for that?

None at all, but it used to be 50% proc chance before they nerfed it by 50%.

 

I kinda doubt it has any kind of cooldown, because with Judgement of Wisdom it is impossible for me to oom on my Shaman. But some serious testing & research wouldn't hurt. (Anyone but the person wasting his time testing)

I'll take your values for now, because I currently don't have the time for the research.

Thanks.
